list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a body of people (typically twelve in number) sworn to give a verdict in a legal case on the basis of evidence submitted to them in court.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the jury returned unanimous guilty verdicts
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bồi thẩm đoàn đã trả lại những người phán quyết có tội nhất

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a mast or other fitting) improvised or temporary.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we need to get that jury rudder fixed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chúng ta cần phải cố định bánh lái ban giám khảo đó
